alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Mexico Beach, or 12 miles north of Port St. Joe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Wewahitchka, Tyndall Air Force Base, Honeyville, Allanton, White City, Overstreet, Cairo, Davis Beach, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Wetappo, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach and Majette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
